law.history: Repealed 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 69, effective December 1, 1972. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 26, sec. 6, effective June 17, 1954. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 242, sec. 27, effective March 23, 1946. -- Repealed in part 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 169, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 1460, 1462.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Paper on which ballots to be printed.
